name: Space Junk Clean Up
description:
Space junk is everywhere in the Antares constellation. Use your garbage collector ship to clean it up. This is a relaxing, stress free game where you'll meet several exotic characters at each solar system and learn some interesting facts about space junk.

HOW TO PLAY

  • Move: Space bar
  • Turn: A & D / left & right
  • Activate / deactivate Junk Collector: J
    • If upgraded, hold J to enlarge it.
  • Navigation menu: M
  • Upgrade shop: N
